name: Innkeeper's Basement
description:
Innkeeper's Basement is a challenging roguelike card game mixed with minesweeper!
Create your character, explore the dungeon, build you deck, drink alcohol to forget bad decisions and vanquish monsters!

Early Access Game Features:
  • 17 races
  • 25 classes
  • 12 constellations
  • 177 cards
  • 40+ monsters
  • 10 dungeons
  • Beer, wine & vodka
  • Humour & satire
... and more to come!

Input:

Mouse is all you need to play the game. Use "WSAD" for easier navigation and hotkeys above the cards (1,2,3,4...) for faster gameplay!

Story:

You have entered the inn and accepted a quest from the Innkeeper to slay rats in his basement.
Unfortunately for you - the basement is a cursed dungeon with no way to leave...

Inspired by:

Slay the Spire, Runestone Keeper, Desktop Dungeons & Minesweeper, among others.

Important fact:

All art in game was AI-generated (not counting placeholders).
